MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK11 postcode area of Menstrie. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:36pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the severity of the damage to our underground cable network and the extent of the repairs that are required. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:32pm on Monday, 11th January 2021.
